page.title: 11Games Children Play cont.
page.content: If the ball hit the kerb at the right angle it would bounce back to you.This was one point to the person who threw the ball. British Bulldog-any number of people could play this game.There were two dens and to start with one person is "on".This person tries to tick the other people as they run from den to den.As the person touches them,they also are "on".So each time it gets harder to reach the other den. Kick the Can-is very much the same as hide and seek.One person was on and had to count up to a hundred,everyone else ran off and hid.The person who was on had to try and find the others however if any person could get back without being seen and kick the can over at the home base,that person was then "on". Rachel Noga and Alison Hawley
